summary: This document certifies the incumbency of Jeffrey Epstein as President of Southern Trust Company, Inc., and outlines the corporation's incorporation details and authority to execute a financial agreement with Deutsche Bank AG. It is signed by Darren K. Indyke, the Secretary of the Corporation.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is the Secretary of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and certifies the document.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of Southern Trust Company, Inc. and has the authority to execute agreements on behalf of the corporation.

connections.description: Darren K. Indyke serves as the Secretary under Jeffrey Epstein, who is the President of the corporation.

keyFacts: Southern Trust Company, Inc. was originally incorporated as Financial Infomatics, Inc. on November 18, 2011.
The name change to Southern Trust Company, Inc. occurred on September 21, 2012.
Jeffrey Epstein is the President of Southern Trust Company, Inc. as of February 26, 2015.
Darren K. Indyke is the Secretary of Southern Trust Company, Inc.
The document includes a reference to a Global Master Repurchase Agreement with Deutsche Bank AG.
